Course/Page.js, line 39

update( options ) → {Promise.<Object>}

Description
Updates a Canvas page
Parameters
Name Type Description
options object object containing all arguments
Name Type Attributes Default Description
courseID number Canvas course ID holding the page to update
pageURL string Canvas page url (just the last part of path)
notifyOfUpdate boolean <optional>
 false if true, send notification
title string <optional>
 current value New title of the page
body string <optional>
 current value New html body of the page
editingRoles string <optional>
 current value New usertype(s) who can edit
published boolean <optional>
 current value New publish status of page
frontPage boolean <optional>
 current value New front page status of page
Returns
Canvas Page https://canvas.instructure.com/doc/api/pages.html#Page
Details

Gabriel Abrams

Course/Page.js, line 136

create( options ) → {Promise.<Object>}

Description
Creates a new page in a course
Parameters
Name Type Description
options object object containing all arguments
Name Type Attributes Default Description
courseId number Canvas course Id to query
title string <optional>
 Untitled Page The title of the page
body string <optional>
 html body of the page
editingRoles string <optional>
 teachers usertype(s) who can edit
notifyOfUpdate boolean <optional>
 false if true, sends notification
published boolean <optional>
 false if true, publishes page upon creation
frontPage boolean <optional>
 false if true, sets page as front page
Returns
Canvas Page https://canvas.instructure.com/doc/api/pages.html#Page
Details

Gabriel Abrams
